description: This file sets up a PDF knowledge base and an agent to query it, specifically for Thai recipes PDF.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content from URLs for question answering.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the answer to a question, optionally formatted in markdown.
